summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Shelton Street and Pearl Street, each from 13th avenue South to 17th avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8064 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
